name: Rockman
overview: There was once a rocky land called Rockland. Her inhabitants, the Rockmen, were otherwise happy if not for the fact their favorite fruit did not grow on rocks, so they had to travel to the neighboring Fruitland to get it. One day, Count Clecot of Fruitland captured Rockman. He promised freedom to the tearful "hero" if he managed to eat all the fruit in the whole Fruitland. Help the Rockman on this task to secure his freedom!
